    "name": "host 001",
    "alias": "I'm the first host created by admin",
    "address": "127.0.0.1",
    "monitoring_server_id": 1,
    "snmp_version": "2c",
    "snmp_community": "snmpCommunity-test",
    "templates": [4],
    "comment": "1, 2, 3",
    "macros": [
        {
        "name": "nameA",
        "value": "valueA",
        "is_password": false,
        "description": "some text"

        "is_password": true,
        "description": null
        }
    ]
}
